titleInfo.title: Letter (copy), J.G.M. Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn., to Albert S. Marks in Nashville, Tenn. 1879 Nov. 18

mods.abstract: 1879 Nov. 18 J.G.M. Ramsey, Knoxville, Tenn., to Gov. Albert S. Marks, Nashville, Tenn. (Copy) Expresses appreciation for the honor of being appointed a delegate to the Yorktown Centennial. Gives account of Tennessee's part in the founding of American independence. Declines the appointment because of his lameness.

name.namePart: Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884

subject.topic: Yorktown (Va.) -- History -- Siege, 1781 -- Centennial celebrations, etc.
